ai-ja338:1.3_0: and after hungering the marks ofhut,
ai-ja338:2.2_0: and even if they’re in the village,
ai-ja338:2.4_0: This has been understood by me:
ai-ja338:3.1_0: It seems that while the Dhamma was born, it seems,
ai-ja338:3.2_0: His father, a monkey, (but) from his son,
ai-ja338:3.3_0: The youthful to their young man
ai-ja338:4.1_0: you’re the current of the Buddha!
ai-ja338:4.2_0: like a mustard seed off the point of discontent.
ai-ja338:4.3_0: to the one who stands on the ground.
ai-ja338:4.4_0: it has been known by me.”
ai-ja338:5.1_0: The eighth section for recitation on the village
